## Gene Details:

- **Gene Name:** C-TERMINAL DOMAIN PHOSPHATASE-LIKE 1, C-terminal domain phosphatase-like 1, FIERY 2, regulators of C-REPEAT BINDING FACTOR (CBF) gene expression 2, SHINY 4
